lore: All sentient creatures find the Nephilim's very presence disturbing. Even a sadistic, unscrupulous ruler or the cruelest of criminals are terrified when one of these creatures approaches.\n\nWhen a Nephilim Shieldbreaker chooses a target, it does not attack directly, instead seeking out those who matter most to its victim and turning them against each other with a single touch of its shield. In this way, its victim will have to witness in horror as their loved ones try to hurt each other in every possible way.
menagerieDialog: I will protect my brethren at all costs. You don't need to worry for their safety as long as I'm around.
None will stand in my way. I have a mission to fulfill, and nothing will stop me from finishing my duties.
Let us take our leave at once. There is work to be done.
I would feel much more comfortable with a different set of creatures fighting by my side. Have you considered employing a more meaningful strategy?
We're in good company with you as our leader, {PLAYERNAME}.
name: Nephilim Shieldbearer
